GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: responds with an object of specific id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, with the body property removed, a comment_count added and in descending order of created_at key

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: takes an article_id and serves an array of all the comments for that article in order of most recent

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: takes an article_id and object with username and comment, adds comment to comments for that article_id and serves comment as a string

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: takes an update (for votes) and updates the votes property for the correct article_id

GET /api/users.description: responds with array of objects of all users
